content.question: Which of the following abiotic factors, when graphed on the x-axis, leads to the curved line in the graph due to variation in the different layers of the atmosphere?

choices.label: Carbon dioxide <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration gradients

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
